data.weather: Dry and settled between Thursday and Sunday with occasional sunshine, and a steady breeze. 2.5mm rain on Monday morning, then dry and gusty. Generally dry and breezy on Tuesday, with 1mm rain during the day, followed by a heavy downpour between 6pm and 7pm which put down 5.5mm rain. Dry and blustery all day Wednesday. Dry overnight Wednesday. Bright and calm start to Thursday, but cloud and breeze set to increase as the day progresses.

data.goingText: Good, Good to Firm in places (GoingStick: 7.8 on Sunday at 07:30)
data.railText: Massive covering of grass.
data.otherText: No change to ground at moment, see how much rain we have as will ease the ground. It is Ladies Day on 31st May and we have two pony races before racing at 1pm and 1.15pm Any questions, please give Robert Bellamy a call on 07836 241458. David
